name: RE: TC - Central Account Management (CAM) API Integration
content:
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click on
links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content
is safe.




Hi Kannan,

 

Have obtained D(TC)’s approval on this SR effort. YH will raise ITSR once he is
back.

 

Please help to kick start the process with your team.

 

Thanks

 

Regards,

Lavanya G

 

From: Kannan Alagu <Kannan.A@totalebizsolutions.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 17, 2023 11:44 AM
To: Lavanya GUNASEKARAN (SINGSTAT) <Lavanya_GUNASEKARAN@singstat.gov.sg>
Cc: Gregory SEOW (SINGSTAT) <Gregory_SEOW@singstat.gov.sg>; Tamilselvam
Tamiliniyan <Tamiliniyan.T@totalebizsolutions.com>; Yan Hao TIONG (SINGSTAT)
<TIONG_Yan_Hao@singstat.gov.sg>; Govindarajan Ponnusamy
<Govind.P@totalebizsolutions.com>
Subject: RE: TC - Central Account Management (CAM) API Integration

 

Hi Lavanya,

PFA revised IA with API Portal,

 

Regards

Kannan

From: Lavanya GUNASEKARAN (SINGSTAT) <Lavanya_GUNASEKARAN@singstat.gov.sg>
Sent: Thursday, August 17, 2023 11:10 AM
To: Kannan Alagu <Kannan.A@totalebizsolutions.com>
Cc: Gregory SEOW (SINGSTAT) <Gregory_SEOW@singstat.gov.sg>; Tamilselvam
Tamiliniyan <Tamiliniyan.T@totalebizsolutions.com>; Yan Hao TIONG (SINGSTAT)
<TIONG_Yan_Hao@singstat.gov.sg>; Govindarajan Ponnusamy
<Govind.P@totalebizsolutions.com>
Subject: RE: TC - Central Account Management (CAM) API Integration

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click on
links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content
is safe.

 

Hi Kannan,

 

As per the ACISO and CAM Team’s clarification , WOG AD cannot be configured to
have grouping for the application access right, so this access mapping needs to
be done on the application level even though the authentication is using WOG AD.

 

Please include CAM API for GCC API portal.

 

 

Regards,

Lavanya G

 

From: Kannan Alagu <Kannan.A@totalebizsolutions.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 16, 2023 8:03 PM
To: Lavanya GUNASEKARAN (SINGSTAT) <Lavanya_GUNASEKARAN@singstat.gov.sg>
Cc: Gregory SEOW (SINGSTAT) <Gregory_SEOW@singstat.gov.sg>; Tamilselvam
Tamiliniyan <Tamiliniyan.T@totalebizsolutions.com>; Yan Hao TIONG (SINGSTAT)
<TIONG_Yan_Hao@singstat.gov.sg>; Govindarajan Ponnusamy
<Govind.P@totalebizsolutions.com>
Subject: RE: TC - Central Account Management (CAM) API Integration

 

Hi Lavanya,

PFA revised CAM API IA document. We’ve reduced the cost to S$77,520.00 from
S$106,080.00.

 

Also note that since API Portal is going to use WOGAD, CAM API is not required
for API Portal; hence removed from this document.

 

Regards,

Kannan

 

From: Lavanya GUNASEKARAN (SINGSTAT) <Lavanya_GUNASEKARAN@singstat.gov.sg>

links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content
is safe.

 

Hi Kannan,

 

As discussed, please revise the SR effort, and update the timeline as CAM
integration needs to complete by Oct 2023

 

Thanks

 

Regards,

Lavanya G

Sent: Tuesday, August 15, 2023 2:30 PM

Hi Kannan,

 

Gentle reminder on the SR quote revision

 

Regards,

Lavanya G

 

From: Lavanya GUNASEKARAN (SINGSTAT)
Sent: Tuesday, August 8, 2023 3:20 PM
To: 'Kannan Alagu' <Kannan.A@totalebizsolutions.com>
Cc: Gregory SEOW (SINGSTAT) <Gregory_SEOW@singstat.gov.sg>; Tamilselvam
Tamiliniyan <Tamiliniyan.T@totalebizsolutions.com>; Yan Hao TIONG (SINGSTAT)
<TIONG_Yan_Hao@singstat.gov.sg>; Govindarajan Ponnusamy
<Govind.P@totalebizsolutions.com>
Subject: RE: TC - Central Account Management (CAM) API Integration

 

Hi Kannan,

 

DOS management is not accepting your SR quote.

 

Please try to reduce it and share us the detailed task list of GPC TFS and GCC
API for the further assessment . As well highlight the common efforts that you
mentioned.

 

Regards,

Lavanya G

 

From: Kannan Alagu <Kannan.A@totalebizsolutions.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 8, 2023 3:09 PM
To: Lavanya GUNASEKARAN (SINGSTAT) <Lavanya_GUNASEKARAN@singstat.gov.sg>
Cc: Gregory SEOW (SINGSTAT) <Gregory_SEOW@singstat.gov.sg>; Tamilselvam
Tamiliniyan <Tamiliniyan.T@totalebizsolutions.com>; Yan Hao TIONG (SINGSTAT)
<TIONG_Yan_Hao@singstat.gov.sg>; Govindarajan Ponnusamy
<Govind.P@totalebizsolutions.com>
Subject: RE: TC - Central Account Management (CAM) API Integration

 

Hi Lavanaya,

The overall effort for CAM API implementation is already optimized.

 

The effort for GPC TFS includes common effort for implementing the CAM framework
and API interface for all other application mentioned in the SR document. That’s
the reason for GPC TFS effort is high where other application efforts are low.
Let me know if you want to distribute the common effort across all applications.

 

For GCC API Portal we like to finalize the AD that will be used for user
authentication: Agency AD or WOGAD. We will come back on this.

 

Regards,

Kannan

 

From: Lavanya GUNASEKARAN (SINGSTAT) <Lavanya_GUNASEKARAN@singstat.gov.sg>
Sent: Monday, August 7, 2023 11:10 AM
To: Kannan Alagu <Kannan.A@totalebizsolutions.com>

links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content
is safe.

 

Hi Kannan,

 

As discussed, TeBs’ quote is higher than other DOS vendors . Please re-visit the
SR efforts for the GPC TFS and GCC API’s CAM APIs integration.  

 

Thanks for your understanding.

 

Regards,

Lavanya G

Anurag verified last week, the AD Group can be used in RSWB and JAMS.

Regards,

Kannan

Thanks

Lavanya G

 

From: Lavanya GUNASEKARAN (SINGSTAT)
Sent: Tuesday, July 25, 2023 11:05 AM
To: 'Kannan Alagu' <Kannan.A@totalebizsolutions.com>
Cc: Gregory SEOW (SINGSTAT) <Gregory_SEOW@singstat.gov.sg>; Tricia TAN
(SINGSTAT) <Tricia_TAN@singstat.gov.sg>; Tamilselvam Tamiliniyan
<Tamiliniyan.T@totalebizsolutions.com>; Yan Hao TIONG (SINGSTAT)
<TIONG_Yan_Hao@singstat.gov.sg>; Govindarajan Ponnusamy
<Govind.P@totalebizsolutions.com>
Subject: RE: TC - Central Account Management (CAM) API Integration

 

Hi Kannan,

 

Last week, I’ve shared SSRS AD group details with you and Anurag. Could you
please help to test and confirm the following is doable instead going for
another round of SR process?

 

Point from the assumptions:

Dashboard (SSRS), JAMS Scheduler and RSWB will be using the same AD Groups for
authentication and authorization. Any change in this assumption may affect the
effort and schedule.

 

 

Regards,

Lavanya G

PFA CAM API impact analysis document. As discussed, I have included the GCC+.

 

Regards

Kannan

From: Lavanya GUNASEKARAN (SINGSTAT)
Sent: Wednesday, July 19, 2023 4:35 PM
To: 'Kannan Alagu' <Kannan.A@totalebizsolutions.com>

<TIONG_Yan_Hao@singstat.gov.sg>; Govindarajan Ponnusamy
<Govind.P@totalebizsolutions.com>
Subject: RE: TC - Central Account Management (CAM) API Integration

 

Hi Kannan,

 

Based on the clarification given by CAM Team, WOG AD cannot be configured to
have grouping for the application access right, so this access mapping needs to
be done on the application level even though the authentication is using WOG AD
and hence CAM API is needed.

 

Please include CAM API integration effort for GCC+ too

 

Thanks

 

Regards,

Lavanya G

 

From: Kannan Alagu <Kannan.A@totalebizsolutions.com>
Sent: Saturday, July 15, 2023 8:29 PM
To: Lavanya GUNASEKARAN (SINGSTAT) <Lavanya_GUNASEKARAN@singstat.gov.sg>

<Govind.P@totalebizsolutions.com>
Subject: RE: TC - Central Account Management (CAM) API Integration

 

Hi Lavanya,

PFA revised CAM API document based on our earlier discussion for your review.
Following are the high light of the changes.

 * Changed to combine Reports, JAMS and RSWB as they are going to use common AD
   Groups.
 * Removed GCC+ CAM API implementation effort as GCC+ going to use WOG AD.

 

Regards,

Kannan

Hi Kannan,

 

Please refer to the following link to get more details about CAM API

 

100 WOG CAM API Interface Specification - Modernisation-Playbook (Published) -
Cloud Playbook (tech.gov.sg)
[https://modernisationplaybook.in.tech.gov.sg/confluence/display/MPP/100+WOG+CAM+API+Interface+Specification]

(Sample codes also available FYR)

 

Thanks

Lavanya G

 

From: Lavanya GUNASEKARAN (SINGSTAT)
Sent: Monday, July 10, 2023 9:55 AM
To: 'Kannan Alagu' <Kannan.A@totalebizsolutions.com>; Tamilselvam Tamiliniyan
<Tamiliniyan.T@totalebizsolutions.com>; Govindarajan Ponnusamy
<Govind.P@totalebizsolutions.com>

(SINGSTAT) <Tricia_TAN@singstat.gov.sg>; Yan Hao TIONG (SINGSTAT)
<TIONG_Yan_Hao@singstat.gov.sg>
Subject: RE: TC - Central Account Management (CAM) API Integration

 

Hi Kannan

 

Please revise the proposal to include the following points from our 7th July
discussion.

 

 * Create a centralized CAM API and use a single Active Directory account across all TC applications to remove user access.
 * PROS and CONS of using a single AD account across all TC applications.
 * Add CAM API for RStudio workbench as TC users have access to RSWB.

 

Thanks

 

Regards,

Lavanya G

 

-----Original Appointment-----

Hi Kannan,

 

The main goal for CAM API is to allow CAM trigger access clean up the user
access on the system after they remove the Active Directory account (either SOE
or DOS).

 

Would like to discuss with you if we need to build CAM APIs for each TC
application or it can be built centrally in one of the application.

 

 

[cid:image001.png@01D9D697.B24B37E0]

 

 

 

_____________________________________________

Kannan

Hi Kannan,

 

Please revise the man-day efforts as discussed, as 200 days is quite high, and
include the Gantt chart for the implementation timetable, as well as change the
reviewer and approver details. The DS&TC team will review it, and D(TC) will
provide the approval.

 

Also, expect to begin implementation by mid-June, as we may require some time to
review the proposal and to obtain D(TC) ’s approval for the quoted SR man-day
efforts. (Change the implementation timeline accordingly )

 

Thanks.

 

Regards,

Lavanya G

Subject: TC - Central Account Management (CAM) API Integration

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click on
links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content
is safe.

 

Hi Tamil,

 

CAM API Integration needs to be built for the TC system to remove accounts
automatically and prevent access in TC system.

 

High level requirements are as follows:

 * Central HR System (HRP) update will trigger ITSM & CAM on any access removal
   request based on Resignment, Retirement, Secondment/Transfer

 * Deprovisioning of the ICT services will start on the leaver’s last day from
   1800hr to 2359hr
 * Automate disablement of WOGAD accounts when staff have >90 days continuous No
   Pay Leave
 * Automate disablement of dormant WOGAD user accounts without login for 90
   days  (in the future)

 

Note : The common CAM IT Component and agent setup was already done by AFM

 

Will schedule a meeting to discuss the CAM API requirements in detail and SR
man-days.

 

Thanks

Regards,

Lavanya G
